Package org.apache.avalon.activation.appliance.impl

The appliance.impl package contains the default implementations defining and enabling use of the central Appliance interface.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DefaultApplianceMBean An Appliance is the basic tool merlin wraps around a component to provide support for lifecycle and lifestyle management.
 

Class Summary
AbstractAppliance An Appliance is the basic tool merlin wraps around a component to provide support for lifecycle and lifestyle management.
AbstractBlock The AbstractBlock is responsible for the management of the assembly of the subsidiary appliances, the coordination of the deployment, decommissioning and eventual dissassembly of contained appliances, and the overall management of a containment context.
BlockThread The DefaultBlockThread provides support for the execution of a block.
CompositeBlock The DefaultBlock is responsible for the management of the assembly of the subsidiary appliances, the coordination of the deployment, decommissioning and eventual dissassembly of contained appliances, and the overall management of a containment context.
DefaultAppliance DefaultAppliance is the default implementation of a local appliance instance.
DefaultBlockContext Context object applied to a new block.
DefaultServiceContext Service context supplied to an appliance factory.
 

Package org.apache.avalon.activation.appliance.impl Description

The appliance.impl package contains the default implementations defining and enabling use of the central Appliance interface. An Appliance is the basic tool merlin wraps around a component to provide support for lifecycle and lifestyle management. Different implementations of Appliance can be plugged into the merlin system to allow merlin to manage a variety of components.
